summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SoundMirror visual speech articulation training platform. All core features working correctly including dual head animations, alphabet keyboard, audio integration, and Gemini AI grading.

resolved_issues.fix_applied: Moved logger configuration before Gemini client initialization

passed_tests: Backend API health check (28/28 endpoints passing)
Phoneme mapping and frame info endpoints
Gemini AI grading endpoint (mock responses working)
Home page loading with SoundMirror branding
Navigation between pages (Home, Letter Practice, Word Practice, History)
Dual head animation component with PNG sprites loading from local assets
Alphabet keyboard with 29 letters including special characters (CH, SH, TH)
Animation controls (play, pause, reset, audio toggle)
Local asset loading (240 MP3 audio files, 40 PNG sprite images)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core features working, minor keyboard selector optimization needed)
success_percentage.assets: 100% (all local PNG sprites and MP3 audio files loading correctly)
